name: Sethos
title: "Wisdom's Measure" Sethos
desc: A visitor from the sea of sand, profound in providence.

talent_card.name: Pylon of the Sojourning Sun Temple

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Sethos to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Ancient Rite: The Thundering Sands
skills.desc: The opposing active character gains Electro Application, and you switch to your next character. Attach Thunder Convergence to self.

skills.name: Secret Rite: Twilight Shadowpiercer
skills.desc: Deals ? ?. Attaches Twilight Meditation to self.

skills.name: Black Kite's Enigma
skills.desc:
Character's own Normal Attacks will not generate Energy.
After performing a Normal Attack: If possible, consume all Energy and deal Piercing DMG equal to the amount consumed +1 to the enemy with the lowest HP.
